name: 24x7 Server Management
tag_list: server-management, server-monitoring, server-security, server-optimizations, vps-hosting, server-hardening, web-hosting-support, server-support, website-monitoring, cpanel-server-management, direct-admin-server-management, plesk-server-management
overview:
24x7 Server Management is India’s leading fully managed IT Services Provider equipped with a world-class support center.

Professional server security, server hardening and server optimization services for Linux Cpanel, Plesk and DirectAdmin shared & reseller hosting servers. Complete security analysis with 3rd party installation services provided by 24x7 Server Management. 24x7 Server Management offers fully managed Virtual Private Servers (VPS) at affordable rates. VPS hosting available on Xen and KVM platforms with standard configurations on powerful hardware nodes. Our support operations are available 24x7 - 365 days a year via ticket and live chat support. 100% satisfaction with 7 Days Money Back Guarantee.

offices.address1: 3rd Floor,T-2 Chintamani Bldg, Above Fitness Point,
